p: Conclusively, the present study showed for the first time that SF extracts exhibit a pronounced neuroprotective effect against A β toxicity. In combination with their significant antioxidant potential shown here and by others as well [ 17, 18, 20– 27, 29], and their known anticholinesterase ability [ 20, 33, 34], SF extracts can prove useful for the treatment of AD and of other neurodegenerative diseases.
